name: Space Debris (itch) (ivandor87)
description:
The game involves a lot of physics, including the gravity of planets, the behavior of objects relative to this gravity.

The processes taking place in the game are always unpredictable, so you can observe the behavior, or you can make your own adjustments).

Each level is a randomly generated universe with randomly left garbage in it. With each subsequent level, generation becomes more complicated, and the ongoing processes become even more interesting.

If there are difficulties in passing any level, you can skip it by clicking in the menu.

Have a good space exploration to you!)
